Title: Effective Aggregate Design Part II by Vaughn Vernon
Content:
Vaughn Vernon has just published [Part II](http://dddcommunity.org/library/vernon_2011) of his Effective Aggregate Design series.

* [Part I](http://dddcommunity.org/sites/default/files/pdf_articles/Vernon_2011_1.pdf) considers the modelling of an aggregate.
* [Part II](http://dddcommunity.org/sites/default/files/pdf_articles/Vernon_2011_2.pdf) looks at the model and design issues of how different aggregates relate to each other.
